languages.text: Has a 4 AP burst attack that unloads full clip and staggers the wielder for 1 Round. Reload costs 3 AP.

traits.locale_text: Has a 4 AP burst attack that unloads full clip and staggers the wielder for 1 Round. Reload costs 3 AP.

languages.text: This weapon has a {g|Encyclopedia:BurstAttacksGlossary}burst{/g} attack (4 {g|Encyclopedia:ActionPoints}AP{/g}) with a {g|Encyclopedia:RateOfFire}rate of fire{/g} equal to the number of shells in the magazine. When the wielder uses it, they become {g|Encyclopedia:StaggeredEffect}staggered{/g} for 1 {g|Encyclopedia:Round}round{/g}. {g|Encyclopedia:Reload}Reloading{/g} costs 3 AP.
languages.original_text: Этим оружием можно применить {g|Encyclopedia:BurstAttacksGlossary}атаку очередью{/g} (4 {g|Encyclopedia:ActionPoints}ОД{/g}) со {g|Encyclopedia:RateOfFire}скорострельностью{/g}, равной числу зарядов в магазине. После этого применяющий оказывается {g|Encyclopedia:StaggeredEffect}ошеломлен{/g} на 1 {g|Encyclopedia:Round}раунд{/g}. {g|Encyclopedia:Reload}Перезарядка{/g} требует 3 ОД.

traits.locale_text: This weapon has a burst attack (4 AP) with the rate of fire equal to the number of pellets in the magazine. When the wielder uses it, they become staggered for 1 round. Reloading costs 3 AP.

This weapon has a {g|Encyclopedia:BurstAttacksGlossary}burst{/g} attack (4 {g|Encyclopedia:ActionPoints}AP{/g}) with a {g|Encyclopedia:RateOfFire}rate of fire{/g} equal to the number of shells in the magazine. When the wielder uses it, they become {g|Encyclopedia:StaggeredEffect}staggered{/g} for 1 {g|Encyclopedia:Round}round{/g}. {g|Encyclopedia:Reload}Reloading{/g} costs 3 AP.

This weapon has a {g|Encyclopedia:BurstAttacksGlossary}burst{/g} attack (4 {g|Encyclopedia:ActionPoints}AP{/g}) with a {g|Encyclopedia:RateOfFire}rate of fire{/g} equal to the number of shells in the magazine. When the wielder uses it, they become {g|Encyclopedia:StaggeredEffect}staggered{/g} for 1 {g|Encyclopedia:Round}round{/g}. {g|Encyclopedia:Reload}Reloading{/g} costs 3 AP.

languages.text: Bu silahın, {g|Encyclopedia:RateOfFire}atış hızı{/g} şarjördeki fişek sayısına eşit olan bir {g|Encyclopedia:BurstAttacksGlossary}seri saldırısı{/g} (4 {g|Encyclopedia:ActionPoints}EP{/g}) bulunur. Kullanan kişi, bu saldırıyı yaptığında {g|Encyclopedia:StaggeredEffect}afallar{/g}. Etkisi 1 {g|Encyclopedia:Round}raunt{/g} sürer. Silahı {g|Encyclopedia:Reload}doldurmak{/g} 3 EP harcar.
languages.original_text: This weapon has a {g|Encyclopedia:BurstAttacksGlossary}burst{/g} attack (4 {g|Encyclopedia:ActionPoints}AP{/g}) with a {g|Encyclopedia:RateOfFire}rate of fire{/g} equal to the number of shells in the magazine. When the wielder uses it, they become {g|Encyclopedia:StaggeredEffect}staggered{/g} for 1 {g|Encyclopedia:Round}round{/g}. {g|Encyclopedia:Reload}Reloading{/g} costs 3 AP.

traits.locale_text: Bu silahın, atış hızı şarjördeki fişek sayısına eşit olan bir seri saldırısı (4 EP) bulunur. Kullanan kişi, bu saldırıyı yaptığında afallar. Etkisi 1 raunt sürer. Silahı doldurmak 3 EP harcar.

Bu silahın, atış hızı şarjördeki fişek sayısına eşit olan bir seri saldırısı (4 EP) bulunur. Kullanan kişi, bu saldırıyı yaptığında afallar. Etkisi 1 {g|Encyclopedia:Round}raunt{/g} sürer. Silahı doldurmak 3 EP harcar.

languages.text: Esta arma tiene un ataque de {g|Encyclopedia:BurstAttacksGlossary}ráfaga{/g} (4 {g|Encyclopedia:ActionPoints}PA{/g}) con una {g|Encyclopedia:RateOfFire}cadencia de disparo{/g} igual al número de cartuchos que le queden. Cuando el portador lo usa, queda {g|Encyclopedia:StaggeredEffect}desequilibrado{/g} durante 1 {g|Encyclopedia:Round}asalto{/g}. {g|Encyclopedia:Reload}Recargar{/g} cuesta 3 PA.
languages.original_text: This weapon has a {g|Encyclopedia:BurstAttacksGlossary}burst{/g} attack (4 {g|Encyclopedia:ActionPoints}AP{/g}) with a {g|Encyclopedia:RateOfFire}rate of fire{/g} equal to the number of shells in the magazine. When the wielder uses it, they become {g|Encyclopedia:StaggeredEffect}staggered{/g} for 1 {g|Encyclopedia:Round}round{/g}. {g|Encyclopedia:Reload}Reloading{/g} costs 3 AP.

traits.locale_text: Esta arma tiene un ataque de ráfaga (4 PA) con una cadencia de disparo igual al número de cartuchos que le queden. Cuando el portador lo usa, queda desequilibrado durante 1 asalto. Recargar cuesta 3 PA.

languages.text: 这把武器可以进行{g|Encyclopedia:BurstAttacksGlossary}连发{/g}射击（消耗4点{g|Encyclopedia:ActionPoints}行动点数{/g}），{g|Encyclopedia:RateOfFire}射速{/g}等同于弹匣内的子弹数量。当装备者使用连发射击之后，会陷入{g|Encyclopedia:StaggeredEffect}恐慌{/g}状态，持续一{g|Encyclopedia:Round}轮{/g}。{g|Encyclopedia:Reload}重新装弹{/g}消耗3点行动点数。
languages.original_text: This weapon has a {g|Encyclopedia:BurstAttacksGlossary}burst{/g} attack (4 {g|Encyclopedia:ActionPoints}AP{/g}) with a {g|Encyclopedia:RateOfFire}rate of fire{/g} equal to the number of shells in the magazine. When the wielder uses it, they become {g|Encyclopedia:StaggeredEffect}staggered{/g} for 1 {g|Encyclopedia:Round}round{/g}. {g|Encyclopedia:Reload}Reloading{/g} costs 3 AP.

traits.locale_text: 这把武器可以进行连发射击（消耗4点行动点数），射速等同于弹匣内的子弹数量。当装备者使用连发射击之后，会陷入恐慌状态，持续一轮。重新装弹消耗3点行动点数。

languages.text: Cette arme dispose d'une {g|Encyclopedia:BurstAttacksGlossary}attaque en rafale{/g} (4 {g|Encyclopedia:ActionPoints}PA{/g}) à la {g|Encyclopedia:RateOfFire}cadence de tir{/g} égale au nombre de cartouches dans son chargeur. Quand l'utilisateur s'en sert, il est {g|Encyclopedia:StaggeredEffect}sidéré{/g} pendant 1 {g|Encyclopedia:Round}round{/g}. Le {g|Encyclopedia:Reload}rechargement{/g} coûte 3 PA.
languages.original_text: This weapon has a {g|Encyclopedia:BurstAttacksGlossary}burst{/g} attack (4 {g|Encyclopedia:ActionPoints}AP{/g}) with a {g|Encyclopedia:RateOfFire}rate of fire{/g} equal to the number of shells in the magazine. When the wielder uses it, they become {g|Encyclopedia:StaggeredEffect}staggered{/g} for 1 {g|Encyclopedia:Round}round{/g}. {g|Encyclopedia:Reload}Reloading{/g} costs 3 AP.

traits.locale_text: Cette arme dispose d'une attaque en rafale (4 PA) à la cadence de tir égale au nombre de cartouches dans son chargeur. Quand l'utilisateur s'en sert, il est sidéré pendant 1 tour. Le rechargement coûte 3 PA.

languages.text: この武器は、弾倉のシェルの数と同じ{g|Encyclopedia:RateOfFire}発射速度{/g}で{g|Encyclopedia:BurstAttacksGlossary}バースト攻撃{/g}（4{g|Encyclopedia:ActionPoints}AP{/g}）する。使用者が使用すると、1 {g|Encyclopedia:Round}ラウンド{/g}の間{g|Encyclopedia:StaggeredEffect}よろけ{/g}状態となる。{g|Encyclopedia:Reload}リロード{/g}コストが3AP。
languages.original_text: This weapon has a {g|Encyclopedia:BurstAttacksGlossary}burst{/g} attack (4 {g|Encyclopedia:ActionPoints}AP{/g}) with a {g|Encyclopedia:RateOfFire}rate of fire{/g} equal to the number of shells in the magazine. When the wielder uses it, they become {g|Encyclopedia:StaggeredEffect}staggered{/g} for 1 {g|Encyclopedia:Round}round{/g}. {g|Encyclopedia:Reload}Reloading{/g} costs 3 AP.

traits.locale_text: この武器は、弾倉のシェルの数と同じ発射速度でバースト攻撃（4AP）する。使用者が使用すると、1ラウンドの間よろけ状態となる。リロードコストが3AP。
この武器は、弾倉のシェルの数と同じ発射速度でバースト攻撃（4AP）する。使用者が使用すると、1ラウンドの間よろけ状態となる。リロードコストが3AP。

languages.text: Diese Waffe hat einen {g|Encyclopedia:BurstAttacksGlossary}Salvenangriff{/g} (4 {g|Encyclopedia:ActionPoints}AP{/g}) mit einer {g|Encyclopedia:RateOfFire}Feuerrate{/g}, die der Zahl der Patronen im Magazin entspricht. Wenn sie der Träger benutzt, {g|Encyclopedia:StaggeredEffect}taumelt{/g} er 1 {g|Encyclopedia:Round}Runde{/g} lang. {g|Encyclopedia:Reload}Nachladen{/g} kostet 3 AP.
languages.original_text: This weapon has a {g|Encyclopedia:BurstAttacksGlossary}burst{/g} attack (4 {g|Encyclopedia:ActionPoints}AP{/g}) with a {g|Encyclopedia:RateOfFire}rate of fire{/g} equal to the number of shells in the magazine. When the wielder uses it, they become {g|Encyclopedia:StaggeredEffect}staggered{/g} for 1 {g|Encyclopedia:Round}round{/g}. {g|Encyclopedia:Reload}Reloading{/g} costs 3 AP.

traits.locale_text: Diese Waffe hat einen Salvenangriff (4 AP) mit einer Feuerrate, die der Zahl der Patronen im Magazin entspricht. Wenn sie der Träger benutzt, taumelt er 1 Runde lang. Nachladen kostet 3 AP.

languages.text: Этим оружием можно применить {g|Encyclopedia:BurstAttacksGlossary}атаку очередью{/g} (4 {g|Encyclopedia:ActionPoints}ОД{/g}) со {g|Encyclopedia:RateOfFire}скорострельностью{/g}, равной числу зарядов в магазине. После этого применяющий оказывается {g|Encyclopedia:StaggeredEffect}ошеломлен{/g} на 1 {g|Encyclopedia:Round}раунд{/g}. {g|Encyclopedia:Reload}Перезарядка{/g} требует 3 ОД.
languages.original_text: This weapon has a {g|Encyclopedia:BurstAttacksGlossary}burst{/g} attack (4 {g|Encyclopedia:ActionPoints}AP{/g}) with a {g|Encyclopedia:RateOfFire}rate of fire{/g} equal to the number of shells in the magazine. When the wielder uses it, they become {g|Encyclopedia:StaggeredEffect}staggered{/g} for 1 {g|Encyclopedia:Round}round{/g}. {g|Encyclopedia:Reload}Reloading{/g} costs 3 AP.

traits.locale_text: Этим оружием можно применить атаку очередью (4 ОД) со скорострельностью, равной числу зарядов в магазине. После этого применяющий оказывается ошеломлен на 1 раунд. Перезарядка требует 3 ОД.
Этим оружием можно применить атаку очередью (4 ОД) со скорострельностью, равной числу зарядов в магазине. После этого применяющий оказывается ошеломлен на 1 раунд. Перезарядка требует 3 ОД.
